meanings.definition: The chemical processes that occur within a living organism in order to maintain life.
meanings.sent1: Healthy metabolisms help our bodies stay alive and active.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study metabolisms to understand how living things work.
meanings.sent3: The race between the metabolisms of the cells was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her metabolism was like a busy factory, constantly producing energy.
meanings.sent5: The metabolism of a plant is like a bustling city, with different areas working together.

meanings.definition: The rate at which these processes occur in an individual.
meanings.sent1: His slow metabolisms made it hard for him to lose weight.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often have fast metabolisms due to their active lifestyles.
meanings.sent3: The snail's metabolism was so slow, it took days to digest a leaf.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to have a metabolism of its own, moving faster when we're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The metabolism of a sloth is like a leisurely stroll through the forest.
